alphabetsoup.framework
Class Map

java.lang.Object
  alphabetsoup.framework.Map
All Implemented Interfaces:
Updateable
public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updateable

Map manages the spatial location of all of the buckets, bucketbots, and stations. It moves bucketbots and buckets upon request, as long as they will not collide with another bucketbot or bucket. It also provides queries relating to if objects will collide.

Author:
Chris Hazard

Constructor Detail

Map

public Map(float map_width,
           float map_height,
           float map_tolerance,
           float max_acceleration,
           float max_velocity)
Constructs a map with given dimensions and tolerance

Parameters:
map_width - width of the map
map_height - height of the map
map_tolerance - tolerance for Buckets to be picked up by Bucketbots
max_acceleration - maximum acceleration of anything on the map
max_velocity - maximum velocity of anything on the map

Parameters:
r - Bucketbot object to add
Returns:
Returns true if the Bucketbot can be and has been placed, false if it cannot be placed

Parameters:

isBucketbotMoveValid

public boolean isBucketbotMoveValid(Bucketbot r,
                                    float x_new,
                                    float y_new)
Returns true if moving the bucketbot to the new location is valid. It checks map boundaries, whether there are any robots in the new location, or, if the bucketbot is carrying a bucket, it will make sure there is no bucket in that location.

Parameters:
r - bucketbot to move
x_new - new x position
y_new - new y position
Returns:
true if the move is valid

moveBucketbot

public boolean moveBucketbot(Bucketbot r,
                             float x_new,
                             float y_new)
Moves the bucketbot to a new location if it is a valid move. It is just like isBucketbotMoveValid, but it actually moves the bucketbot (and bucket if applicable).

Parameters:
r - bucketbot to move
x_new - new x position
y_new - new y position
Returns:
true if the move is valid and was made
See Also:
isBucketbotMoveValid(Bucketbot, float, float)

isValidBucketStorageLocation

public boolean isValidBucketStorageLocation(Bucket b,
                                            float x_new,
                                            float y_new)
Checks to see if a location is valid for storing a bucket. A location is invalid if storing the bucket will overlap a word or letter station, or if it will collide with another bucket.

Parameters:
b - bucket to check
x_new - new x position
y_new - new y position
Returns:
true if the location is valid

getShortestTimeWithoutCollision

public float getShortestTimeWithoutCollision()
Returns the shortest amount of time that bucketbots will operate until the next possible collision.

Returns:
shortest possible time until next collision

getNextEventTime

public double getNextEventTime(double cur_time)
Description copied from interface: Updateable
Gets the time of the earliest scheduled or possible event

Specified by:
getNextEventTime in interface Updateable
Parameters:
cur_time - the current system time
Returns:
the absolute time of the soonest possible event. Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY is valid return value if no events are scheduled, and no known collisions or pending events are known to happen.
